translation.TT_1_1_HelpText: Shows a Text. Set check Operation manual to OK or NOK.
translation.TT_2_31_HelpText: Check if operations are done that are configured in Ref_OperationRelation. Set check operation manual to OK or NOK.
translation.TT_3_31_HelpText: Check if operations are done that are configured in OsRef_OperationRelation. An additional text is shown for security purposes (DS). Set check operation manual to OK or NOK. Set OK requires user Right OsProcess.SetOperationsOK.
translation.TT_4_2_HelpText: Shows a text field to catch a string that is scanned with an USB scanner.
translation.TT_12_3_HelpText: PLC tightener with values per tightening.
translation.TT_19_7_HelpText: No longer use! PickByLight connected via database. DELETE!!!
translation.TT_23_9_HelpText: Measuring PLC (Single OP) status only as measured values.
translation.TT_27_16_HelpText: Marriage of order to carrier in PLC.
translation.TT_28_23_HelpText: Shows status of an Operation, manual setting of the status.
translation.TT_29_23_HelpText: Shows status of an Operation, manual setting of the Status IF user rights available.
translation.TT_32_24_HelpText: Sending rack type for current order to PLC.
translation.TT_35_30_HelpText: Check if operations are done that are configured in OsRef_OperationRelation. SET decision with configurable buttons.
translation.TT_38_1_HelpText: List of checks. By pressing NOK a separate screen appears and a comment can be added for the current check. Defect entries will be created IF configured for the check.
translation.TT_41_26_HelpText: PositionClear signal to PLC via PlcComService.
translation.TT_44_1_HelpText: List of checks. By pressing NOK the rework screen appears and a comment can be added for the current check. Defect entries will be created by entering the comment in the rework screen. A picture can be shown for a check.
translation.TT_46_9_HelpText: Setting of status values in a picture.
translation.TT_47_7_HelpText: PickByLight connected via PLC over SPAService.
translation.TT_48_25_HelpText: Press tool PLC connected via SPA service.
translation.TT_49_26_HelpText: PositionClear signal to PLC via SPA Service.
translation.TT_50_1_HelpText: Executes a Procedure in the database to check something. Returns OK or NOK and shows a result message.
translation.TT_51_3_HelpText: PLC tightening with status values per tightening (Multi Ops).
translation.TT_54_12_HelpText: Tool to put the changed oil amount manual.
translation.TT_56_9_HelpText: Measuring PLC (Multi OP) only status in result.
translation.TT_57_16_HelpText: Marriage of order to carrier in PLC over SPA service.
translation.TT_60_3_HelpText: PLC tightener with values per tightening (Multi OPs) via SPAService.
translation.TT_61_2_HelpText: Scanner via PLC via SPA Service with ToolNotifier DB.
translation.TT_62_4_HelpText: Stamping unit PLC connected via SPA service.
translation.TT_65_12_HelpText: Tool to request oil filling via PLC.
translation.TT_68_7_HelpText: Manual picking of parts (possibility to show interactive picture maximized).
translation.TT_69_5_HelpText: Execution of database procedures (evaluates returnstatus as operationstatus).
translation.TT_75_9_HelpText: Measuring via WCF (tool shows measured values list).
translation.TT_80_2_HelpText: Scanner via PLC with ToolNotifier DB.
translation.TT_81_2_HelpText: Scanner via PLC via SPA Service.
translation.TT_84_9_HelpText: Measuring PLC (Single OP) with measured values and sends the last measured values to PLC.
translation.TT_85_26_HelpText: PositionClear signal to PLC with destination for order. When the SC fires the OP we read the Destination once more up-to-date from the database.
translation.TT_86_26_HelpText: PositionClear signal to PLC via SPA Service with destination for order. When the SC fires the OP we read the Destination once more up-to-date from the database.
translation.TT_89_6_HelpText: Leaktest connected via WCF, NEW (config Database).
translation.TT_90_9_HelpText: Measuring via WCF (tool shows measured values list).
translation.TT_91_5_HelpText: Shows pictures (OK Button enabled WITH right OsProcess.SetDSChecksIO).
translation.TT_100_31_HelpText: We build a sum of operation results for a list of operations. Check if all operations are OK that are configured in OsRef_OperationRelation (Operation list configured in ConfigEx). If only one Operation result is NOK the sum here is NOK. Manual result possible with configurable decision buttons.
translation.TT_101_31_HelpText: Check if operations are done that are configured in OsRef_OperationRelation. (Operation list configured in ConfigEx) Set decision with configurable buttons.
translation.TT_102_30_HelpText: Check if operations are done that are configured in OsRef_OperationRelation. (Operation list configured in ConfigEx) Set decision with configurable buttons.
translation.TT_104_26_HelpText: Prisma StationsStatus over StationController to PLC.
translation.TT_105_26_HelpText: Prisma StationsStatus over SPAService to PLC.
translation.TT_106_2_HelpText: Scanner controlled by PLC, data exchange via SPA Service.
translation.TT_67_9_HelpText: Measuring PLC (Single OP) with values and limits sent to PLC.
translation.TT_107_1_HelpText: Check list controlled by PLC, data exchange via SPA Service.
translation.TT_109_7_HelpText: PickByLight with parts list from assembly pack.
translation.TT_111_32_HelpText: Capture picture with operation in StationController.
translation.TT_122_9_HelpText: Measuring via file to AVL TDC measurement PC.
translation.TT_137_2_HelpText: Cognex-Scanner via Ethernet direct with Reloaded Operation.
translation.TT_139_23_HelpText: Generate operations for QGate without SC.
translation.TT_141_27_HelpText: Unipas Testbench saved in measuring values.
translation.TT_92_9_HelpText: Measuring PLC with measured values (tool shows measured values list).
translation.TT_145_27_HelpText: Reads results from UNIPAS (transmission) testbench file to show results in StationController tool and saves results in Measuring operation.
translation.TT_146_5_HelpText: Checks SourcePath(ExecutionPath) and moves files to Destination(ExecutionArguments), if the amount of files(included in ProgNo) is correct.
translation.TT_149_5_HelpText: Call of external WebApi and processing of results.
translation.TT_152_26_HelpText: PositionClear signal to WCF Tool with target for order (with Reload).
translation.TT_154_36_HelpText: Tool for external communication via ServiceLayer.
translation.OC_DECISION_1_HelpText: Always perform with constant operation parameters
translation.OC_DECISION_4_HelpText: Part in the order's bill of materials. Station-independent.
translation.OC_DECISION_5_HelpText: SAA in the order's bill of materials.
translation.OC_DECISION_9_HelpText: Decision about part in the bill of materials with reference to the scanner result of the reference operation. Required if the JobNo used here depends on an optionally installed part in a previous station.
translation.OC_DECISION_11_HelpText: Part in the order's bill of materials and any assembly scope (MU) of the current station. Required e.g. for commissioning (PickToLight) to determine correct part quantity and shelf location in the current station.
translation.OC_DECISION_16_HelpText: At least one reference operation has no IO result.
translation.OC_DECISION_17_HelpText: Part in the bill of materials station-independent (like 4) and SAA (Link: logical AND).
translation.OC_DECISION_18_HelpText: Part and model series (Link: logical AND).
translation.OC_DECISION_21_HelpText: Assembly line assigned to the order.
translation.OC_DECISION_22_HelpText: Part in the order's bill of materials and a specific assembly scope (MU) of the current station. Required e.g. for commissioning (PickToLight) to divide station into left and right shelf.
translation.OC_DECISION_23_HelpText: Model series and SAA must be in the order. (Link: logical AND).
translation.OC_DECISION_24_ClassDescription: 24 - Model series and SAA and attribute
translation.OC_DECISION_24_HelpText: Model series and SAA and AttributeCode and AttributeValue must be in the order (Link: logical AND).
translation.OC_DECISION_25_HelpText: Both SAAs must be in the order. (Link: logical AND).
translation.OC_DECISION_26_HelpText: AttributeCode and AttributeValue must be in the order (Link: logical AND).
translation.OC_DECISION_27_HelpText: Decision about the MU in a station.
translation.OC_DECISION_28_HelpText: Model series and AttributeCode and AttributeValue must be in the order (Link: logical AND). If AttributeCode = %, only the model series is checked.
translation.OC_DECISION_34_HelpText: Multiple reference operations NOK and part number (DecisionClass = 4).
translation.OC_DECISION_35_ClassDescription: 35 - Reference operation NOK + Variant Input Format
translation.OC_DECISION_35_HelpText: Multiple reference operations NOK and Variant Input Format (DecisionClass = 7).
translation.OC_DECISION_36_HelpText: Multiple reference operations OK and part number (DecisionClass = 4).
translation.OC_DECISION_37_ClassDescription: 37 - Reference operation OK + Variant Input Format
translation.OC_DECISION_37_HelpText: Multiple reference operations OK and Variant Input Format (DecisionClass = 7).
translation.OC_DECISION_38_HelpText: Customer number and model series and SAA must be in the order. (Link: logical AND).
translation.OC_DECISION_43_HelpText: Model series and part and assembly line.
translation.OC_DECISION_44_HelpText: Model series and part and part.
translation.OC_DECISION_46_HelpText: Decision about Station MU + Assembly Line.
translation.OC_DECISION_48_HelpText: At least one calculated reference operation has no IO result.
translation.OC_GENERATION_0_2_HelpText: No additional data is read. Everything comes from the OSREF_ScanningDetail. Normally not used.
translation.OC_GENERATION_1_1_HelpText: Standard, is filled from the template-related detail table OsRef_CheckingDetail.
translation.OC_GENERATION_1_2_HelpText: Standard, additional info Acceptor, Validity, Partname, Partamount from VIEW_OS_PARTS (variant part with part and order).
translation.OC_GENERATION_1_3_HelpText: Standard, additional info (ProgNo) is read from OsRef_TighteningDetail.
translation.OC_GENERATION_1_4_HelpText: Emboss type plate: embossing string from bs_dottingdata and the AENR instead of xxxxxx reduced to 60 characters, 3 lines.
translation.OC_GENERATION_1_5_HelpText: Standard, additional info (ProgNo, Path, Parameter) is read from OsRef_ExecutionDetail.
translation.OC_GENERATION_1_6_HelpText: Standard, additional info (ProgNo) is read from OsRef_LeakTestDetail.
translation.OC_GENERATION_1_7_HelpText: Standard, additional info (ProgNo) from OsRef_CommissioningDetail and part info from VIEW_OS_PartsPerStation are read.
translation.OC_GENERATION_1_8_HelpText: Standard, additional info is read via fct_ECUGetOrderData. Should be improved!
translation.OC_GENERATION_1_9_HelpText: Standard, additional info (ProgNo, NumberOfLimits) is read from OsRef_MeasuringDetail.
translation.OC_GENERATION_1_12_HelpText: Min and Max from ConfigExplorer. ActualLiquidAmount is calculated from the last result. Use only with SC/SPA and Saving Class 1.
translation.OC_GENERATION_1_29_HelpText: Standard, table Os_BuildingConditionDetailList is filled with SAAs relevant for the assembly order.
translation.OC_GENERATION_2_4_HelpText: Emboss engine number: embossing string from Vieworder.unitnumber_part1 and unitendno combined.
translation.OC_GENERATION_2_7_HelpText: Gets the data from the bill of materials except for the Consumerlocation!! Specifically for DDC engines, when Consumerlocation does not come from SAP. If the part is not in the bill of materials, the detail data is used.
translation.OC_GENERATION_2_9_ClassDescription: 02 - With limits of the reference OP
translation.OC_GENERATION_2_9_HelpText: Gets the limit values from the results of the reference operation Measuring.
translation.OC_GENERATION_2_12_HelpText: Quantity is determined from the bill of materials, remaining parameters from configuration data.
translation.OC_GENERATION_2_24_HelpText: Calculates the job number from the job numbers of multiple operations. ReferenceOperationId required.
translation.OC_GENERATION_2_25_HelpText: Special wheel hub Gaggenau removal band 8 and 40.
translation.OC_GENERATION_2_29_HelpText: Download RackID, Vin, Orderinfo to PLC.
translation.OC_GENERATION_2_30_ClassDescription: 02 - With timestamp of the reference OP
translation.OC_GENERATION_2_30_HelpText: Gets the timestamp from the result of the TimeTracking reference operation.
translation.OC_GENERATION_3_9_HelpText: Calculates the job number from the job numbers of multiple operations. ReferenceOperationId required.
translation.OC_GENERATION_3_15_HelpText: Calculates if all reference operations are IO (OperationResult sum at StationEnter for PCS) - Returns 1 in program number for all OK or 2 for not all OK, - operation(s) to be checked defined via VerificationClass 2.
translation.OC_GENERATION_3_25_HelpText: Read destination from result of the reference operation of type Decision.
translation.OC_GENERATION_4_1_HelpText: Display check operation with indicated part number. Like Class 1, additionally a note with the part number. Only possible with Decision Part!
translation.OC_GENERATION_4_4_HelpText: Emboss type plate: embossing string from bs_dottingdata and the AENR instead of xxxxxx (like 1 but complete 100 characters = 5 lines).
translation.OC_GENERATION_4_7_ClassDescription: 04 - Use configuration data / Bill of materials
translation.OC_GENERATION_4_7_HelpText: Transfer of data from ConfigExplorer, only part number and part description if available from the bill of materials.
translation.OC_GENERATION_4_25_HelpText: Read destination from Operations-Status of reference operation (thus destination = 1 or 2). Reference OP can be of any type.
translation.OC_GENERATION_5_1_HelpText: Display current target of the order. ViewOrder.Act_conveyordestination join bs_conveyor_destination.
translation.OC_GENERATION_5_7_HelpText: Needed for TeilPerStationMU, if part is not in the bill of materials, then the detail data is used.
translation.OC_GENERATION_5_12_ClassDescription: 05 - Calculation without current oil quantity (PCS ONLY)
translation.OC_GENERATION_5_12_HelpText: (ONLY PCS) The current oil quantity is determined from the last operation result and used to calculate the target filling quantity. Use storage class 3. When saving, the current oil quantity is set to 0.
translation.OC_GENERATION_6_1_HelpText: Multiple part numbers are displayed sequentially.
translation.OC_GENERATION_6_4_HelpText: Emboss type plate: PTSI Interface, embossing string from bs_dottingdata and the UNITIDENTNO instead of xxxxxxxx (complete 100 characters = 5 lines).
translation.OC_GENERATION_6_7_HelpText: Parts list of a complete MU of the station.
translation.OC_GENERATION_6_12_HelpText: Only the configured values are taken. No Results are considered.
translation.OC_GENERATION_7_1_HelpText: Optional part numbers are displayed sequentially, considering assembly scope (MU).
translation.OC_GENERATION_7_2_HelpText: Multiple part numbers are entered sequentially in field Partname.
translation.OC_GENERATION_8_2_HelpText: Shows the expected CarrierId of the order. Mexico special.
translation.OC_GENERATION_8_7_HelpText: Parts list with color-marked optional parts, considering MU/Group.
translation.OC_GENERATION_9_7_HelpText: Everything from the config, also part number.
translation.OC_GENERATION_10_2_HelpText: Optional part numbers are entered sequentially in field Partname, considering assembly scope (MU).
translation.OC_GENERATION_10_7_HelpText: -Shows the field salesinfo (descriptive name) as part name -Replaces optional item. Only 1 component is displayed. Only valid with DecisionClass 4 and 22.
translation.OC_GENERATION_11_2_ClassDescription: 11 - Compare scanned PartNo of RefOP with Comparestring
translation.OC_GENERATION_11_2_HelpText: Compare scanned part number of the reference OP with Comparestring=partner part to reference ScanOp.
translation.OC_GENERATION_11_4_ClassDescription: 11 - Kassel Special PTSI Type plate 6 lines
translation.OC_GENERATION_11_4_HelpText: Emboss type plate: PTSI Interface, embossing string from bs_dottingdata and the UNITIDENTNO instead of xxxxxxxx (complete 100 characters = 5 lines + one header line with DAIMLER AG).
translation.OC_GENERATION_12_2_HelpText: Generation of Comparestring with Codevalue from BS_Attribute, CompareString in OSAdmin is used for decision = Code.
translation.OC_GENERATION_12_4_ClassDescription: 12 - Kassel Special PTSI Type plate 6 lines
translation.OC_GENERATION_12_4_HelpText: Emboss type plate: PTSI Interface, embossing string from bs_dottingdata and the UNITIDENTNO instead of xxxxxxxx (complete 100 characters = 5 lines + one header line with DAIMLER TRUCK AG).
translation.OC_GENERATION_13_4_HelpText: Emboss type plate: embossing string from bs_dottingdata and the AENR instead of xxxxxx reduced to 40 characters, 2-lines. 3rd line currently placeholder. 4th line Orderno.
translation.OC_GENERATION_14_2_HelpText: Writes order number of the sub-order into Comparestring.
translation.OC_GENERATION_14_4_HelpText: Type plate 5-lines. Emboss type plate: PTSI Interface, embossing string from BS_ADDORDERENGINE the ENGINEFAMILY and bs_dottingdata and the UNITIDENTNO instead of xxxxxxxx (complete 100 characters = 5 lines).
translation.OC_GENERATION_15_4_HelpText: Type plate 3-lines. CodeValue From BS_Attribute Custmatno from VIEWORDER UnitIdentNO From Vieworder (Only combinable with DecisionClass 26).
translation.OC_GENERATION_16_4_HelpText: Emboss type plate: embossing string from bs_dottingdata and the AENR instead of xxxxxxX (like 4 but 7x complete 100 characters = 5 lines).
translation.OC_GENERATION_17_4_HelpText: Emboss type plate: PTSI Interface, embossing string 7 lines: 1st line - header with DAIMLER TRUCK AG 2nd line - CodeValue for attribute ZTYP2KSE 3rd - 7th line - info from bs_dottingdata and UNITIDENTNO instead of xxxxxxxx (complete 100 characters).
translation.OC_SAVING_2_2_HelpText: Injector saves in ECU_RES_Injector_MCM. No longer used.
translation.OC_SAVING_2_3_HelpText: Set reference tightening operation to 'Not Processed'.
translation.OC_SAVING_2_5_HelpText: Define reference operations. For setting OP-Result to definable status. Required procedure: up_OS_ExecuteSaveOperationResult.
translation.OC_SAVING_2_12_ClassDescription: 02 - Add secondary OP to main OP
translation.OC_SAVING_2_12_HelpText: We have a side operation here whose result we add to the main operation. This means the filled / drained quantity here is then added or subtracted from the main operation. A reference to the main operation must be specified for this operation.
translation.OC_SAVING_2_15_HelpText: Set confirmation point. Call of up_HandleOrderProcessFlow.
translation.OC_SAVING_2_16_HelpText: Set CarrierId for the order. BS_AssemblyStatus.CarrierID.
translation.OC_SAVING_2_29_ClassDescription: 02 - Operation result NOK, create rework, lock order
translation.OC_SAVING_2_29_HelpText: Like Class 1, additionally create rework and lock order for NIO operation result.
translation.OC_SAVING_3_1_HelpText: Deletes order from BS_SMB_ClientOrder if status is 1 or 4.
translation.OC_SAVING_3_2_HelpText: Assign CarrierId to order, update BS_ASSEMBLYSTATUS set carrierid = @Barcode.
translation.OC_SAVING_3_3_HelpText: Saves the serial number of the spindle in OsRes_TighteningDetail as TorqueToolId.
translation.OC_SAVING_3_12_HelpText: The current oil quantity is determined from the last operation result and added to the new operation result.
translation.OC_SAVING_4_1_ClassDescription: 04 - Set Ref OPs to Not Performed
translation.OC_SAVING_4_2_HelpText: Assign KitCardId to order, update BS_ASSEMBLYSTATUS set kitcartid = @Barcode.
translation.OC_SAVING_5_2_HelpText: Marriage of an own pre-assembly order to a main order. (KEM Vomo exists as a separate order in the ViewOrder order tables).
translation.OC_SAVING_6_2_ClassDescription: 06 - Copy pre-assembly operations to main order
translation.OC_SAVING_6_2_HelpText: Marriage of a pre-assembly order that was manufactured for a main order. This means no Vomo order. Vomo is a set of operations formed across all operations of a line. E.g., cylinder head.
translation.OC_SAVING_7_2_HelpText: Scan injectors individually and combine with Op 33 for FUSO and MCM.
translation.OC_SAVING_10_2_HelpText: Scan injectors individually and then assign the DMC to the injector operation. MDEG.
translation.OC_SAVING_14_2_HelpText: Save Gats, is checked during scan in VerificationClass 40.
translation.OC_SAVING_15_2_HelpText: Saves the workpiece carrier/set basket ID in the table Os_CarrierIDOrder. Is checked during scan in VerificationClass 41.
translation.OC_SAVING_16_2_HelpText: Separates the CarrierId from the order. Used at the scan operation of the marriage station from pre-assembly to main line. The order is then separated from the carrier for Vomo.
translation.OC_SAVING_17_2_HelpText: If optional item, the scanned part number is sent to SAP. Insert into OS_SMB_ScanResults. For part-specific booking.
translation.OC_SAVING_19_2_HelpText: Save ZGS for Workpiece Id calculation.
translation.OC_SAVING_20_2_HelpText: Save free text for WorkpieceId calculation.
translation.OC_SAVING_22_2_ClassDescription: 22 - Status of pre-assembly order after marriage
translation.OC_SAVING_22_2_HelpText: Set status of pre-assembly order after marriage.
translation.OC_SAVING_23_2_HelpText: Saves DMC in UnitIdentNo and UnitEndNo. Deletes the DMC from other orders if already assigned. Only use with VerificationClass 59.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_1_1_HelpText: Nothing to compare, always returns ok.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_1_2_HelpText: Nothing to compare, always returns ok.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_1_7_ClassDescription: 01 - no check, then also report IO
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_1_7_HelpText: No check, then also IO feedback.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_2_1_HelpText: Order status not locked, no rework.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_2_2_HelpText: Comparison of the Comparestring. Comparestring must be filled accordingly via GenerationClass. Is a relic, was checked this way before. Attention, now required for PCS scan. So if OP is used as a backup to PCS in a manual station.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_2_5_HelpText: Define reference operation for further processing. Currently procedure for setting OP status.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_2_7_ClassDescription: 02 - Search VO via control loop, then also report IO with VO from operation
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_2_7_HelpText: Search VO via control loop, then also IO feedback with VO from operation. Not used -> Beierle, SC calls up_OS_CheckCommissioningCheck.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_2_15_HelpText: Reference to reference operation(s) for a QGate operation or process flow operation, which forms a sum of the operation status for the reference operations.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_3_1_HelpText: Check if pre-assembly order is in the sequence of its main line. Wheel hub Gaggenau.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_3_2_HelpText: Comparison of the Comparestring, additional check for uniqueness. Comparestring must be filled accordingly via GenerationClass. The barcode is checked for uniqueness (serial number unique). Should be modified so that we check the given text.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_3_15_HelpText: Reference to reference station(s) for the QGate operation operation status forms.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_4_1_HelpText: No check always returns NOK. Used to create rework for all orders with a special part.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_4_2_HelpText: Checks if scanned value is contained in bs_assemblystatus. CarrierID workpiece carrier. See Scan SavingClass 3.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_5_1_HelpText: Check if assembly order is in the sequence of its main line.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_5_2_HelpText: Checks if scanned value is contained in bs_assemblystatus. KitcardId commissioning trolley. See Scan SavingClass 4.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_6_1_HelpText: Reference to reference operation(s) for ProcessFlow Tools Warter, DS Check, OperationStatus Status Sum Images.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_6_2_HelpText: Check InjectorCode PKWT: total length of the barcode, length TrimCode, possibly checksum analogous to Mannheim.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_7_1_HelpText: Check if assembly order is the first in the StationFIFO BS_SMB_ClientOrder.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_7_2_HelpText: Check Injectorlabel PKWT: Compare scanned value with result of PrintViews.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_8_2_HelpText: Should no longer be used! Check part with bill of materials, so that optional parts too, also replaces Verify 2? Attention, Comparestring used for length calculation.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_9_2_HelpText: Check Motorlabel PKWT, manual entry SerialNo, check for valid length.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_10_2_ClassDescription: 10 - Bill of materials part and multiple use
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_10_2_HelpText: Check part with optional installation and multiple use for this OperationId.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_11_2_HelpText: Cross-check of a barcode. Check if barcode was scanned for the same order in one of several reference operations. E.g., if the DMC is currently assigned to the order.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_12_2_HelpText: Special case KEM marriage of a Vomo order. Own Vomo order in ViewOrder. The unitidentno of the Vomo order is scanned. It is checked if everything was OK in the Vomo. Then it is checked: for program no. 1: Variant whether the VomoPart is in the bill of materials of the order. for program no. 2: Vomo for the order, select @Orderno = custorderno from ViewOrder where orderno = @Orderno; for program no. 3: Part in the bill of materials. Together with SavingClass 5.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_13_2_HelpText: UnitEndNo: Check if input is identical with UnitEndNo in BS_ORDER.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_14_2_HelpText: UnitIdentNo: Check if input is identical with UnitIdentNo in BS_ORDER.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_15_2_HelpText: Part ID not as DMC, but: Date, ProdNumber, SerialNo.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_16_2_ClassDescription: 16 - YYDDDNNNNN PartNo, Line, Supplier as Ident
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_16_2_HelpText: Part ID not as DMC, but: YYDDDNNNNN PartNo, Line, Supplier add and deliver DMC.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_17_2_ClassDescription: 17 - Cross-check reference OP and check pre-assembly results
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_17_2_HelpText: Vomo via main order, like 11, additionally check if all Ops in Vomo were IO.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_18_2_HelpText: Any scan with pre-assembly check, e.g., scan STG label.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_19_2_ClassDescription: 19 - Bill of materials part and check pre-assembly results
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_19_2_HelpText: Part in bill of materials (10) and pre-assembly check, check all operation results of the pre-assembly.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_20_2_HelpText: Part in bill of materials (10) and no check for multiple use.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_21_2_ClassDescription: 21 - Bill of materials part and multiple installation across all operations
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_21_2_HelpText: Part in bill of materials (Like 10) but check multiple use across all operations.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_22_2_ClassDescription: 22 - Pre-assembly in main order, check OP results and bill of materials
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_22_2_HelpText: Check of a pre-assembly manufactured for a main order. Pre-assembly is checked for: Existence of results. All results of Vomo OK. Installed in the same order or if different order, then comparison of the bill of materials.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_23_2_ClassDescription: 23 - Bill of materials part and pre-assembly in main order, check OP results and bill of materials
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_23_2_HelpText: Check part and pre-assembly built directly in the main order, now marry. Check Vomo Ops and bill of materials. Thus (22) with additional check Part in bill of materials (20).
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_25_2_HelpText: Checks unitidentno for valid format upon entry. No order to compare with -> India.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_26_2_ClassDescription: 26 - Comparestring + Pre-assembly order marriage + Multiple use
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_26_2_HelpText: Special case KEM like 12, check for double installation Scanverif.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_27_2_ClassDescription: 27 - Comparestring + Pre-assembly order marriage + Multiple use
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_27_2_HelpText: Special case KEM like 26, pre-assembly scope is only checked if the scanned DMC in the range from character 12 <> 000000000.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_28_2_HelpText: Order ID. It is checked against Orderno or UNITENDNO or UNITIDENTNO from BS_ORDER.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_29_2_ClassDescription: 29 - Bill of materials part + Blocklist (Special control unit) + Multiple use
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_29_2_HelpText: Checks for part in bill of materials (10) with check for multiple use, additionally a blacklist is queried. Currently only special part with direct blacklist hardcoded.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_30_2_HelpText: Check Customerprodno. Barcode defined via Barcodetype: UserDataStart and UserDataLength define where the customer production number is in the barcode.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_31_2_ClassDescription: 31 - InjectorCode MDEG, Bill of materials part and multiple installation across all operations
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_31_2_HelpText: Like 21 Part in bill of materials and multiple use. Additionally MDEG injector check digit check.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_32_2_ClassDescription: 32 - Check bill of materials + Multiple via reference operation
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_32_2_HelpText: Special case Mannheim: NOT USED. Check parts via a reference operation, MultipleUseOverAll.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_33_2_ClassDescription: 33 - InjectorCode MDEG, Bill of materials part and multiple installation.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_33_2_HelpText: Special case Mannheim MDEG: Part10 i.e., part in bill of materials, then MultipleUseOverall and InjectorMDEG.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_35_2_ClassDescription: 35 - Comparestrings and multiple use across all operations (like 3)
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_35_2_HelpText: Comparison of the Comparestring, additional check for uniqueness across all operations. Comparestring must be filled accordingly via GenerationClass. The barcode is checked for uniqueness (serial number unique). Should be modified so that we check the given text.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_36_2_ClassDescription: 36 - Bill of materials part and multiple use + KHR, ZK data check
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_36_2_HelpText: Special case Mannheim MDEG: Part with multiple use across all OPs, like (21) additionally MDEG check for cylinder head and rocker arm frame. Checks if ZK matches KHR. Part in bill of materials and ZK KHR pair.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_37_2_HelpText: Checks if the substring was captured with another scan operation for this order.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_38_2_HelpText: Check if the scanned order ID has the same FIN, so that same parent part, then sibling.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_39_2_ClassDescription: 39 - Check DMC pair and multiple installation across all operations
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_39_2_HelpText: Special case PKWT: searches DMC in table BS_DMCPAIR.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_40_2_HelpText: Special case Mannheim HDE: Check GATS DMC from BOX.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_41_2_HelpText: Checks if workpiece carrier/set basket is assigned to a line. The assignment is in table OS_CarrierID and is saved there via SavingClass 15 during scanning. This means we check if the CarrierId is in the table for this line, no check if the carrier is empty. Additionally, it is checked if the order is assigned to another carrier of this line. Select from Os_CarrierIDOrder where AssemblyArea = @AssemblyArea and OperationID = @pl_OperationId and CarrierID = @CarrierId.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_42_2_HelpText: Part in bill of materials like 20, additionally the quantity is checked. But not like Multiple Use for uniqueness, but here with any quantity > same check as multiple use, then this is identical to Verificationclass (10).
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_43_2_HelpText: Is like 42, additionally it is checked that the part fits another part. Here from the same supplier. Other part is thus another scan operation. This must be maintained via reference operation osref_operationrelation. Additionally, the part number of the PARTNER part must be entered in the Comparestring field for the operation. This means for every detail of this operation there is a partner part number to be checked against.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_44_2_HelpText:
We check if the order number is at the desired position in the barcode. A possible prefix or suffix can be defined in the Comparestring. If something is specified in the Comparestring, it is checked as a suffix. For prefix, this must be specified as 
comparetext
.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_45_2_HelpText: Check if the CarrierId in Vomo/Commissioning was assigned to this order. Is saved in table OS_CarrierOrder. Reference to reference operation required.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_47_2_ClassDescription: 47 - Bill of materials part considering assembly scope (MU)
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_47_2_HelpText: Check part considering assembly scope (MU), e.g., relevant for right/left installation according to T.Drum method.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_48_2_ClassDescription: 48 - Bill of materials part with MU, multiple installation across all operations
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_48_2_HelpText: Check part considering assembly scope (MU) and multiple use across all operations, e.g., relevant for right/left installation according to T.Drum method.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_49_2_ClassDescription: 49 - Bill of materials part with MU, multiple installation, same supplier
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_49_2_HelpText: Check part considering assembly scope (MU) and multiple use across all operations. Additionally, it is checked that the part fits another part. Here from the same supplier. Other part is determined from scan result of a reference scan operation. This must be maintained via reference operation. Additionally, the part number of the PARTNER part must be entered in the Comparestring field for the operation. This means for every detail of this operation there is a partner part number to be checked against. E.g., relevant for right/left installation according to T.Drum method.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_50_2_HelpText: Verify changeover. The scanned barcode corresponds to the order number that is resolved. The sheet metal from the order scanned here is thus assigned to the station order. We check if unitendno is accordingly empty or set.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_51_2_ClassDescription: 51 - Comparestring with PartNoPosition and length data
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_51_2_HelpText: Comparison of the Comparestring. Comparestring must be filled accordingly via GenerationClass.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_52_2_HelpText: Checks unitidentno for valid format upon entry + check for uniqueness of UnitIdentNo.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_53_2_HelpText: Checks if the scanned CarrierId is assigned to the order.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_54_2_HelpText: Vomo sub-order marriage. Search Vomo order via reference operation. Check if Vomo Productno as A-item number in BOM of the order and for multiple use.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_55_2_HelpText: Check if scanned part number in BOM. Check for multiple use. Check on operation results of the Vomo sub-order.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_56_2_ClassDescription: 56 - Substring in reference OP and multiple installation all operations
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_56_2_HelpText: Check if substring is contained in scan result of the reference operation and check multiple use across all operations. Substring defined via osdef_scanningbarcodetype.UserDataStartPos and UserDataLength.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_57_2_HelpText: Checks if the barcode is a pre-assembly order and if this has the current order as FIN.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_58_2_ClassDescription: 58 - HDEP Injector TrimCode or partno in Injector DMC
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_58_2_HelpText: HDEP injector: check if manual entry of Trimcode & CRC is correct. VerificationClass returns Dummy-DMC with part number and TrimCode for MCM flashing.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_59_2_HelpText: Check if DMC is already assigned to another order (in field UnitIdentNo). Only use with SavingClass 23.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_60_2_ClassDescription: 60 - BOM, multiple installation, same production no. for reference OPs
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_60_2_HelpText: Check part in BOM, for multiple use and for same production number (DMC substring 12-22) in scan result for all reference operations.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_61_2_HelpText: Verify changeover for parts. The scanned barcode corresponds to the order number that is resolved. The sheet metal from the order scanned here is thus assigned to the station order. We check if unitendno is accordingly empty or set.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_62_2_ClassDescription: 62 - BOM and multiple use (production number only) and barcode length
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_62_2_HelpText: Bill of materials part and multiple use for the production number and barcode length. Consider barcode type.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_63_2_HelpText: Check CustOrderno. Barcode defined via Barcodetype: UserDataStart and UserDataLength define where the customer order no. is in the barcode.
translation.OC_VERIFICATION_97_2_HelpText: Special case Redford Axle: only temporary solution as part number is not correct in the bill of materials.
